verses.verse: The book <S%G976><s%> of the generation <S%G1078><s%> of Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>, the son <S%G5207><s%> of David <S%G1138><s%>, the son <S%G5207><s%> of Avraham <S%G11><s%>.

Avraham <S%G11><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Yitz'chak <S%G2464><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> Yitz'chak <S%G2464><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Ya`akov <S%G2384><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> Ya`akov <S%G2384><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Y'hudah <S%G2455><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>;

And <S%G1161><s%> Aram <S%G689><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Aminadab <S%G284><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> Aminadab <S%G284><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Naasson <S%G3476><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> Naasson <S%G3476><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Salmon <S%G4533><s%>;

And <S%G1161><s%> Yishai <S%G2421><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> the king <S%G935><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> the king <S%G935><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> SHlomo <S%G4672><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> her <S%G3588><s%> that had been the wife of Urias <S%G3774><s%>;

And <S%G1161><s%> SHlomo <S%G4672><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Roboam <S%G4497><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> Roboam <S%G4497><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Abia <S%G7><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> Abia <S%G7><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Asa <S%G760><s%>;

And <S%G1161><s%> Asa <S%G760><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Josaphat <S%G2498><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> Josaphat <S%G2498><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Joram <S%G2496><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> Joram <S%G2496><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Ozias <S%G3604><s%>;

And <S%G1161><s%> Ozias <S%G3604><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Joatham <S%G2488><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> Joatham <S%G2488><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Achaz <S%G881><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> Achaz <S%G881><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Ezekias <S%G1478><s%>;

And <S%G1161><s%> Ezekias <S%G1478><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Manasses <S%G3128><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> Manasses <S%G3128><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Amon <S%G300><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> Amon <S%G300><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Josias <S%G2502><s%>;

And <S%G1161><s%> Josias <S%G2502><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Jechonias <S%G2423><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>, about the time <S%G1909><s%> they were carried away <S%G3350><s%> to Babylon <S%G897><s%>:

And <S%G1161><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> they were brought <S%G3350><s%> to Babylon <S%G897><s%>, Jechonias <S%G2423><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Salathiel <S%G4528><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> Salathiel <S%G4528><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Zorobabel <S%G2216><s%>;

And <S%G1161><s%> Zorobabel <S%G2216><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Abiud <S%G10><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> Abiud <S%G10><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Eliakim <S%G1662><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> Eliakim <S%G1662><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Azor <S%G107><s%>;

And <S%G1161><s%> Eliud <S%G1664><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Eleazar <S%G1648><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> Eleazar <S%G1648><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Matthan <S%G3157><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> Matthan <S%G3157><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Ya`akov <S%G2384><s%>;

And <S%G1161><s%> Ya`akov <S%G2384><s%> begat <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5656><s%> Yosef <S%G2501><s%> the husband <S%G435><s%> of Miryam <S%G3137><s%>, of <S%G1537><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> was born <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5681><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>, who <S%G3588><s%> is called <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5746><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%>.

So <S%G3767><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the generations <S%G1074><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Avraham <S%G11><s%> to <S%G2193><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> are fourteen <S%G1180><s%> generations <S%G1074><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G575><s%> David <S%G1138><s%> until <S%G2193><s%> the carrying away <S%G3350><s%> into Babylon <S%G897><s%> are fourteen <S%G1180><s%> generations <S%G1074><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the carrying away <S%G3350><s%> into Babylon <S%G897><s%> unto <S%G2193><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> are fourteen <S%G1180><s%> generations <S%G1074><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> the birth <S%G1083><s%> of Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%> Moshiach <S%G5547><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> <S%G5713><s%> on this wise <S%G3779><s%>: When as <S%G1063><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> Miryam <S%G3137><s%> was espoused <S%G3423><s%> <S%G5685><s%> to Yosef <S%G2501><s%>, before <S%G4250><s%> <S%G2228><s%> they <S%G846><s%> came together <S%G4905><s%> <S%G5629><s%>, she was found <S%G2147><s%> <S%G5681><s%> with child <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1064><s%> <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5723><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> Yosef <S%G2501><s%> her <S%G846><s%> husband <S%G435><s%>, being <S%G5607><s%> <S%G5752><s%> a just <S%G1342><s%> man, and <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> willing <S%G2309><s%> <S%G5723><s%> to make <S%G3856><s%> her <S%G846><s%> a publick example <S%G3856><s%> <S%G5658><s%>, was minded <S%G1014><s%> <S%G5675><s%> to put <S%G630><s%> her <S%G846><s%> away <S%G630><s%> <S%G5658><s%> privily <S%G2977><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> while he <S%G846><s%> thought on <S%G1760><s%> <S%G5679><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, the angel <S%G32><s%> of the YY <S%G2962><s%> appeared <S%G5316><s%> <S%G5648><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> in <S%G2596><s%> a dream <S%G3677><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>, Yosef <S%G2501><s%>, thou son <S%G5207><s%> of David <S%G1138><s%>, fear <S%G5399><s%> <S%G5680><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> to take <S%G3880><s%> <S%G5629><s%> unto thee <S%G4675><s%> Miryam <S%G3137><s%> thy wife <S%G1135><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> that which is conceived <S%G1080><s%> <S%G5685><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> her <S%G846><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> she shall bring forth <S%G5088><s%> <S%G5695><s%> a son <S%G5207><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> thou shalt call <S%G2564><s%> <S%G5692><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G846><s%> shall save <S%G4982><s%> <S%G5692><s%> his <S%G846><s%> people <S%G2992><s%> from <S%G575><s%> their <S%G846><s%> sins <S%G266><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> was done <S%G1096><s%> <S%G5754><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> it might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> <S%G5686><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> was spoken <S%G4483><s%> <S%G5685><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> the YY <S%G2962><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the prophet <S%G4396><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> <S%G5723><s%>,

Behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G5628><s%>, a virgin <S%G3933><s%> shall be with child <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1064><s%> <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5692><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shall bring forth <S%G5088><s%> <S%G5695><s%> a son <S%G5207><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> they shall call <S%G2564><s%> <S%G5692><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> ``Immanu'EL <S%G1694><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> being interpreted <S%G3177><s%> <S%G5746><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G5748><s%>, 'Elohim <S%G2316><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> us <S%G2257><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> Yosef <S%G2501><s%> being raised <S%G1326><s%> <S%G5685><s%> from <S%G575><s%> sleep <S%G5258><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> <S%G5656><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> the angel <S%G32><s%> of the YY <S%G2962><s%> had bidden <S%G4367><s%> <S%G5656><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> took <S%G3880><s%> <S%G5627><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> his wife <S%G1135><s%>:

And <S%G2532><s%> knew <S%G1097><s%> <S%G5707><s%> her <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> till <S%G2193><s%> <S%G3739><s%> she had brought forth <S%G5088><s%> <S%G5627><s%> her <S%G846><s%> firstborn <S%G4416><s%> son <S%G5207><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> he called <S%G2564><s%> <S%G5656><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name <S%G3686><s%> Yeshuw`a <S%G2424><s%>.
